Title: Moon Over Parador
Writer: Charles G. Booth (story), Leon Capetanos (screenplay), Paul Mazursky (screenplay)
Actors: Richard Dreyfuss, Raul Julia, Sônia Braga, Jonathan Winters
Plot: Little known actor, Jack Noah, is working on location in the country of Parador at the time the dictator dies. The dictator's right hand man, Roberto, makes Jack an offer he cannot refuse.. to play the dictator. Jack's acting skills fool the masses but not close friends and employees of the dictator.
